    • 方法详细资料

      • localize

        public static void localize()
        Localizes the robot to theta = 0.

      • average

        public static void average()
        By checking two angles outerward, turn to the half of their sum. ie.45 degree

      • turnToDistanceRight

        public static void turnToDistanceRight()
        turn right until it gets faceDistance.

      • turnToDistanceLeft

        public static void turnToDistanceLeft()
        turn left until it gets faceDistance.

      • readUsDistance2

        public static int readUsDistance2()
        Use the median filter to get a correct sample.
        返回:
        the distance filtered.

      • readUsDistance1

        public static int readUsDistance1()
        Use the average filter to get a correct sample.
        返回:
        the distance filtered.

      • getSample

        public static int getSample()
        返回:
        distance read from the USsensor.

      • median

        public static int median​(int[] Oddarr)
        Get a median of an array with an odd length, even length doesn't work.
        参数:
        Oddarr - (odd length)
        返回:
        median of the array

      • getAverage

        public static int getAverage​(int[] array)
        get an average of input array eliminating lowest and highest value.
        参数:
        array - input
        返回:
        average of the array eliminating lowest and highest value

      • init

        public static void init()

      • moveStraightFor

        public static void moveStraightFor​(double distance)
        Move straight for a given distance in meters.
        参数:
        distance - distance in meter

      • turnBy

        public static void turnBy​(double angle)
        Turns the robot by a specified angle. Note that this method is different from Navigation.turnTo(). For example, if the robot is facing 90 degrees, calling turnBy(90) will make the robot turn to 180 degrees, but calling Navigation.turnTo(90) should do nothing (since the robot is already at 90 degrees).
        参数:
        angle - the angle by which to turn, in degrees

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance​(double distance)
        Converts input distance to the total rotation of each wheel needed to cover that distance.
        参数:
        distance - the input distance in meters
        返回:
        the wheel rotations necessary to cover the distance in degrees

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle​(double angle)
        Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
        参数:
        angle - the input angle in degrees
        返回:
        the wheel rotations necessary to rotate the robot by the angle in degrees

      • stopMotors

        public static void stopMotors()
        Stops both motors.

      • setSpeed

        public static void setSpeed​(int speed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to the same values.
        参数:
        speed - the speed in degrees per second

      • setSpeeds

        public static void setSpeeds​(int leftSpeed,
                             int rightSpeed)
        Sets the speed of both motors to different values.
        参数:
        leftSpeed - the speed of the left motor in degrees per second
        rightSpeed - the speed of the right motor in degrees per second

      • setAcceleration

        public static void setAcceleration​(int acceleration)
        Sets the acceleration of both motors.
        参数:
        acceleration - the acceleration in degrees per second squared
